title: Practical Project Management in Instructional Design Based on the ISD Model

context.prior_knowledge: Basic project management and instructional design principles understanding
context.additional_context: Smartphone-based mobile learning environment combined with offline workshops

learning_goals: Can systematically manage the five stages (planning-analysis-design-development-evaluation) of instructional design projects using ISD model phases
Can reduce educational development risks by over 30% through controlling project scope, timeline, budget, and human resources
Can design educational solutions incorporating stakeholder requirements by applying change management tools and communication plans

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
